name: Combined Ball Color
description:
Combined Ball Color is a 3D Hyper Casual game where you have to combine the colored balls in order to recreate the required color.

In this game you have to combine, think and create. You have to be faster than time. Each part is randomly generated. 5 colors to recreate are available.

You have 30 seconds to create the color requested, could you make it happen?

This game playable with the mouse.

CONTROLS :

⭐ - HOLD LEFT CLICK to drag.

⭐ - The colored balls combine automatically.

TOOLS USED :

🔧 - Unity (2020.3.15f2 Version)

🔧 - Audacity
